Source code for Pipeline.tests.test_PUA

import pytest

import pandas as pd

import numpy.testing as npt

from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
from sklearn.utils.testing import assert_array_equal
from sklearn.utils.testing import assert_allclose

from Pipeline.DPA import DensityPeakAdvanced
np.set_printoptions(precision = 17)

    #data_F1 = np.loadtxt("/Users/mariaderrico/Research/Advanced-Density-Peaks/examples/example_PUA/densities.csv")
    return data_F1

@pytest.fixture

[docs]def output_PUA_testPAk():
    # Read benchmark output of the PAk algorithm: right after the search of the
    # correction for bias and the shift in the densities values.
    #out_F1 = pd.read_csv("./benchmarks/output_PUA_testPAk.csv", sep=" ", header=None)
    out_F1 = pd.read_csv("./benchmarks/Point.info", sep=" ", header=None)
    out_F1.columns = ["index", "k_hat", "dc", "rho","rho_err","label","halo"]
    return out_F1

    out_PUA.columns = ["clu"]

[docs]def is_almost_equal(x,y,mismatch, decimal):
    d = 0
    for i in range(len(x)):
        if abs(x[i]-y[i]) > 1.5 * 10**(-decimal):
            d += 1
    print(d/len(x)*100)
    if d/len(x)*100>mismatch:
        npt.assert_almost_equal(x, y, decimal=decimal)
    else:
        assert True



[docs]def test_PointAdaptive_kNN(densities_PUA, error_densities_PUA, k_hat_PUA, data_PUA, distances_PUA, indices_PUA, output_PUA_testcenter_premerging, output_PUA_testcenter, output_PUA_testg, output_PUA_testPAk, output_PUA_labels, output_PUA_labelsHalos, output_PUA_borders):
    est = DensityPeakAdvanced(Z=0, k_max = 1001, n_jobs=-1, affinity="precomputed", densities=densities_PUA, err_densities=error_densities_PUA, k_hat=k_hat_PUA,  nn_distances=distances_PUA, nn_indices=indices_PUA, dim=9)
    #est = DensityPeakAdvanced(Z=0, k_max = 1001, n_jobs=-1, affinity="precomputed", nn_distances=distances_PUA, nn_indices=indices_PUA, dim=9)
    #est = DensityPeakAdvanced(Z=0, k_max = 1000, n_jobs=-1, affinity="precomputed",  nn_distances=distances_PUA, nn_indices=indices_PUA, dim=2)
    #assert est.dim == None
    assert est.k_max == 1001
    assert est.D_thr == 23.92812698
    assert est.metric == "euclidean"
    assert est.dim_algo == "twoNN"    
  
    df_bm = output_PUA_testPAk
    is_almost_equal(densities_PUA, df_bm['rho'].values, 0., 2)

    est.fit(data_PUA)
    #est.fit(distances_PUA)
    assert hasattr(est, 'is_fitted_')

    assert est.k_max == max(est.k_hat) # k_max include the point i
    assert len(distances_PUA) == len(est.densities)
    print(est.densities[0:10])
    print(len(est.centers_))
    print(est.centers_[:10])
    print(output_PUA_testcenter[:10])
    #print(list(set(est.centers_).__xor__(set(output_PUA_testcenter_premerging['index'].values))))
    print(list(set(est.centers_).__xor__(set(output_PUA_testcenter['index'].values))))
    print(len(set(est.centers_).intersection(output_PUA_testcenter['index'].values)))
    for i in list(set(est.centers_).__xor__(set(output_PUA_testcenter['index'].values))):
        print(i, est.densities[i], est.err_densities[i], est.centers_.index(i), list(est.labels_).count(est.centers_.index(i)), est.centers_[est.labels_[i]-1])
    #i=4140
    #print(i, est.densities[i], est.err_densities[i], est.centers_.index(i), est.labels_[i], est.centers_[est.labels_[i]])
#    for i in range(len(est.topography_)):
#        print(est.topography_[i][0], est.topography_[i][1], est.topography_[i][2], est.topography_[i][3])

    print(est.labels_[77], est.labels_[96], est.labels_[104])
    print(est.centers_[1], est.centers_[2])
    print("here")
    #for i in range(len(est.topography_)):
    #    #if est.topography_[i][0]==1 and est.topography_[i][0]==2:
    i = 356
    print(est.topography_[i])
    print(est.k_hat[104], est.k_hat[272])
    for i in range(0,len(densities_PUA)):
        for k in range(0,est.k_hat[i]+1):
            if indices_PUA[i][k]==104:
                print(i, est.k_hat[i], k, indices_PUA[i][k])

    print(len(np.unique(est.labels_)))
    print(len(est.centers_))
    g = [densities_PUA[i]-error_densities_PUA[i] for i in range(0,len(densities_PUA))]
    is_almost_equal(g, output_PUA_testg['g'].values, 0.16, 2)

    df_bm = output_PUA_testPAk
    is_almost_equal(est.densities, df_bm['rho'].values, 0., 2)
    #is_almost_equal(est.err_densities, df_bm['rho_err'].values, 0.23, 3)
    #is_almost_equal(est.k_hat, df_bm['k_hat'].values, 0.075, 0)
    is_almost_equal(est.err_densities, df_bm['rho_err'].values, 0., 3)
    #is_almost_equal(est.dc_, df_bm['dc'].values, 0.05, 3)
    is_almost_equal(est.k_hat, df_bm['k_hat'].values, 0.0, 0)
    
    assert_array_equal(est.labels_, [c-1 for c in output_PUA_labels["clu"]])
    is_almost_equal(est.halos_, [c-1 for c in output_PUA_labelsHalos["clu"]], 0.01, 0)
    #assert_array_equal(est.halos_, output_PUA_labelsHalos["clu"])

    assert_array_equal([est.topography_[i][0]+1 for i in range(len(est.topography_))], output_PUA_borders["i"])
    assert_array_equal([est.topography_[i][1]+1 for i in range(len(est.topography_))], output_PUA_borders["j"])
    npt.assert_almost_equal([est.topography_[i][2] for i in range(len(est.topography_))], output_PUA_borders["rho_b"], decimal=3)
    npt.assert_almost_equal([est.topography_[i][3] for i in range(len(est.topography_))], output_PUA_borders["err_rho_b"], decimal=3)
